eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 07:38 PM ON OCT 22, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 11:16 PM OCT 26, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: A SAFE Alert has been issued for Tucson Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Tucson Police Department is looking for a white female, Nancy Hancock, 82 years-old, 5 foot 3 inches, 190 lbs, with gray hair and green eyes. Nancy was last seen wearing a peach-colored shirt, khaki pants and black closed-toed sandals. She was last seen in the area of south Sarnoff Drive and east 25th street in Tucson, Arizona, Pima County on 10/22/2025 at approximately 0800 hours. Nancy was last seen driving a white 2010 Toyota Venza four-door sedan, with Arizona license plate 7 X A 6 3 V.  Nancy has a medical condition that can cause her to become easily confused. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
